reviews.review_msg: Mostly interacted with the TA who was very helpful, replied fast to emails, very nice and clear. If you keep up with the readings and ask questions to clarify, you'll do fine. Class was very straight-forward and clear.

Class was very straight forward, the learning objectives were clearly stated each week in the module. I studied for the final exam by reviewing the learning log questions and studying the learning objectives, did amazing. Do your readings and get a good idea of it to support your writing, will be useful for exams.
